data.aiOpinion: {"Problem_Found":"Disabling the TACACS server may impact authentication processes for network devices that rely on it.","Category":"Security","Outage_Potentials":{"Data_Plane":false,"Control_Plane":true},"Possible_Solution":"Ensure that an alternative authentication method is configured before removing the TACACS server to avoid outages."}
